comment: Reparametrization lemma. The reparametrization of a path by any continuous map ` G : II --> II ` with ` G ( 0 ) = 0 ` and ` G ( 1 ) = 1 ` is path-homotopic to the original path. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
